text: Dhanusha 4 () is one of four parliamentary constituencies of Dhanusha District in Nepal. This constituency came into existence on the Constituency Delimitation Commission (CDC) report submitted on 31 August 2017. ==Incorporated areas== Dhanusha 4 incorporates Bateshwar Rural Municipality, Lakshminya Rural Municipality, wards 1–3 and 5-11 of Mithila Municipality. wards 1–7 Chhireshwarnath Municipality, wards 2 and 6–10 of Mithila Bihari Municipality and wards 9, 13, 14, 19, 21 and 22 of Janakpur Sub-metropolitan City. ==Assembly segments== It encompasses the following Madhesh Province Provincial Assembly segment *Dhanusha 4(A) *Dhanusha 4(B) ==References== Category:Parliamentary constituencies of Nepal
title: Dhanusha 4 (constituency)
